item.title: 2019 Q4 Reading List
item.description: Here are some of the highlights from my 2019 reading: The Infinite Game, by Simon Sinek You have to have an “infinite mindset” to build the best companies. Short-term focus will never build a resilient and inspiring company. I love this book and would recommend it to anyone helping build a growing business. More Info Accelerate, by Nicole Forsgren, Jez Humble, and Gene Kim This came out in 2018, but it had a big enough impact I wanted to make sure to put it down on the this first quarterly list.

item.title: Measuring your Engineering Culture
item.description: Creating the right operational culture for your engineering team is critical to having a high performing team. item.title: Engineering Compensation - The Pursuit of Fairness
item.description: In the product development department at Weave, our motto is Never Satisfied. We are constantly trying to improve how we work, including experimenting with changes to department processes and organization as a whole. One of the ways we have improved over the last couple of years is how we determine engineering compensation. Historically it has been hard to determine pay structure and ultimately those who could negotiate best had an advantage.

item.title: What Does a CTO Do?
